pullRequest.title: [FLINK-19811][table-planner] Introduce RexSimplify to simplify SEARCH conditions
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
after Calcite upgraded to 1.26, a IN (1, 2) AND a = 1 can't be simplified to a = 1. CALCITE-4364 will fix this. But CALCITE-4364 will be in 1.27. One approach is we introduce a utility method to fix this, while many Calcite rules use RexSimplify to simplify expressions and will revert the expressions converted by the utility method. Another approach is we introduce RexSimplify class, and add our fix into the RexSimplify class. This is a temporary solution, once upgrading to Calcite 1.27,  RexSimplify class should be removed.
Brief change log

Introduce RexSimplify to simplify SEARCH conditions

Verifying this change
This change added tests and can be verified as follows:

Extended FlinkRexUtilTest to verify the change

Anything that affects deployment or recovery: JobManager (and its components), Checkpointing, Kubernetes/Yarn/Mesos, ZooKeeper: (yes / no / don't know)
The S3 file system connector: (yes / no / don't know)

Documentation

If yes, how is the feature documented? (not applicable / docs / JavaDocs / not documented)

nodes.bodyText: Improve what? This case seems correct.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -402,6 +403,57 @@ class FlinkRexUtilTest {
     val predicate16 = rexBuilder.makeCall(LESS_THAN, a, a)
     val newPredicate16 = FlinkRexUtil.simplify(rexBuilder, predicate16)
     assertEquals(rexBuilder.makeLiteral(false).toString, newPredicate16.toString)
+
+    // c = 0 AND SEARCH(c, [0, 1])
+    val predicate17Equals = rexBuilder.makeCall(EQUALS, c, intLiteral(0))
+    val predicate17 = rexBuilder.makeCall(
+      AND,
+      predicate17Equals,
+      rexBuilder.makeIn(c, java.util.Arrays.asList(
+        intLiteral(0),
+        intLiteral(1))))
+    val newPredicate17 = FlinkRexUtil.simplify(rexBuilder, predicate17)
+    assertEquals(
+      rexBuilder.makeIn(c, Collections.singletonList[RexNode](intLiteral(0))).toString,
+      newPredicate17.toString)
+
+    // c = 0 OR SEARCH(c, [0, 1])
+    // TODO improve this

commit.message:
[FLINK-19811][table-planner] Introduce RexSimplify to simplify SEARCH conditions

e.g. [CALCITE-4364] `a IN (1, 2) AND a = 1` should be simplified to `a = 1`
